option.label: Better Espionage Screen
option.help: When checked, uses Almightix's Better Espionage Screen.

option.label: Show Calculated Information
option.help: When checked, shows calculated espionage information.

option.label: Ratio Color
option.help: Default color used for espionage ratios.

list.label: Good Ratio Cutoff
list.help: Ratios less than or equal to this value are colored with the following color.

option.label: Good Color
option.help: Color used for good espionage ratios.

list.label: Bad Ratio Cutoff
list.help: Ratios greater than or equal to this value are colored with the following color.

option.label: Bad Color
option.help: Color used for bad espionage ratios.

option.label: Possible Mission Color
option.help: Color used for missions that you can perform now (you have enough EPs against the target).

list.label: Close Percent Cutoff
list.help: Determines how close your EPs have to be to the cost of a mission for it to be considered close to possible.

option.label: Close Mission Color
option.help: Color used for missions that you can perform soon (you have close to enough EPs against the target).
